StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: A B-Tech graduate from Malaviya National Institute of Technology, Jaipur with over 1 and a half year experience in field of big data spark, hive, sql and python. Currently working as ETL engineer for a travel and hospitality giant. Worked in feature engineering, modelling and data analysis in pyspark (python spark), familiar with environment of qubole and Aws.

PositionHistory.Title: Associate AEG
PositionHistory.Description:
Collection of data from various upstream sources and applying transformations and actions as per the requirements. Storing of processed information in AWS S3 & hive with proper policies for further usage by downstream teams. Providing personalized attributes at user level to the decision engine team to send the final personalized mail campaigns. Working in tandem with marketing managers for targeting specific users for new campaigns. Also finding the user coverage for each of such campaigns. Automation of daily process using Jenkins where the output is used for promotional mails to 70 million people worldwide. Using AWS SDK's and other services like lambda. Writing python-spark scripts for overall ETL process. Data validations using qubole and pyspark. Aws Cost Optimization done to reduce the cost of existing production jobs running in Jenkins platform. Designed a Cross Sell Model for the customers using one line of business to attract them to other lob's
